messages.subject: Weather was: Night wetting /Julie S. ducking!...
messages.msgSnippet: From: rubyprincesstsg@aol.com mummy124@bellsouth.net writes: I m sitting here actually contemplating on if I will need to turn the ac back on. I was hoping not
messages.messageBody:
From: rubyprincesstsg@...
mummy124@... writes:
I'm sitting here actually contemplating on if I will need to turn the ac
back on. I was hoping not to but the next few days are supposed to be in the
low 80's. I don't get much of a breeze in the house so I'll hold a bit
longer and see what happens.



Mary B.>>>>
Is it your cold/warm season now? or do you live with this all the time? I've always lived with definite seasons it hard to understand it always being warm.
Teresa in Can.




In VA it was near 80 today (77 around noon, the last time I checked). By
Friday morning it's supposed to be 12 degrees FREEZING!

Amazing weather lately.

glena
